Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is partially red in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of at least two lines of black-painted copy-text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394833) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394833)
